content.question: Nan Madol can best be described as a complex that is composed of

choices.label: a cluster of buildings overlooking the confluence of two rivers
concrete embankments providing support for multi-storied structures
artificial islands that are protected from the ocean by seawalls
a large structure surrounded by alternating rings of walls and waterways

content.answer: artificial islands that are protected from the ocean by seawalls

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
